description: Comprehensive Job Build Variants - Integrated from opkAI advanced system
comment: Each job path has 5 build variants: specialized builds 1-4 + balanced build 5

agi_knight.name: Agi Knight
agi_knight.description: Two-hand sword specialist with high ASPD and evasion
agi_knight.recommended_for: Solo farming, MVP hunting, high damage output

vit_knight.name: Vit Knight
vit_knight.recommended_for: Party tanking, WoE, grinding tough monsters

bowling_bash.name: Bowling Bash
bowling_bash.description: AoE bash specialist for multi-target damage
bowling_bash.recommended_for: Mob farming, leveling zones with grouped monsters

crit_knight.name: Crit Knight
crit_knight.description: Critical strike build for consistent damage

holy_cross.name: Holy Cross
holy_cross.description: Grand Cross specialist with holy magic damage

shield_tank.name: Shield Tank
shield_tank.description: Maximum defense tank with shield skills

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.description: Sacrifice skill specialist with high HP

support.name: Support
support.description: Hybrid tank/healer with buffs and healing

fast_cast.name: Fast Cast
fast_cast.description: Reduced cast time for faster spell rotation

fire_bolt.name: Fire Bolt
fire_bolt.description: Single target nuker with fire magic

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.description: Elemental bolt specialist with field magic

autospell.name: Auto-spell
autospell.description: Minimal cast delay for fast spellcasting

crit_hunter.name: Crit Hunter
crit_hunter.description: Critical strike archer with high crit rate

combo_monk.name: Combo Monk
combo_monk.description: Combo attack specialist with high ASPD

tank_monk.name: Tank Monk
tank_monk.description: High HP melee fighter with combos

battle_smith.name: Battle Smith
battle_smith.description: Melee combat tank with axe mastery

cart_build.name: Cart Build
cart_build.description: Cart Revolution specialist with high speed

sb_sin.name: SB Sin
sb_sin.description: Sonic Blow specialist with high ASPD

integration_notes.stat_allocator: This file integrates with stat_allocator.py - it looks up build_type from job_build_variants[job_path]['builds'][build_type]['stat_targets']
integration_notes.skill_learner: Skill rotations are defined separately in skill_rotations.json and extended_skill_rotations.json
integration_notes.job_detector: Job advancement detector uses progression arrays to track advancement readiness
integration_notes.usage: Load this file in addition to existing job_change_locations.json for comprehensive build support
